Body:
with tempfile.TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    run_strainchoosr(treefile='tests/tree_files/tree.nwk',
        number_representatives=[5, 10], output_name=os.path.join(tmpdir,
        'st_report'), weight_file='tests/text_files/weights.txt')
    assert os.path.isfile(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'st_report.html'))
